data.title: Managed Dedicated Servers
data.meta_description: Afghanistan no 1 web hosting, custom software development, web design and development, graphic design, ERP, Cloud and IT services.
data.text:
AfghanID Host Dedicated Server is more than just a server, it is a fully managed solution designed to take your business to the next level. Not only do we give you easy server management but we also include cPanel license for free with every dedicated server. Your server will be provisioned, secured, and typically delivered within 24/48 hours of purchase.

Having a dedicated server will provide your sites with a higher level of security, speed, and uptime. You will have the capability to go far beyond the resource limitations found in a AfghanID Host Starter Hosting plans.
